name: Pyro Support
description: This build focuses on empowering Bennett's burst skill by stacking Energy Recharge. Keep in mind that the bonus ATK given to his Elemental Burst skill only comes from Base ATK, not ATK%.

name: Physical DPS
description: This build empowers Bennett's physical damage output, ignoring his Elemental Skill completely. We're looking for the highest Base ATK possible to empower his Elemental Burst skill.
